pageproperties-jsmodule-import-file-uplo: please increase PHP's post_max_size and upload_max_filesize to continue (current upload limit: $1)
pageproperties-jsmodule-import-selectfil: Select a csv or json file
pageproperties-jsmodule-import-categorie: Templates and parser functions allowed, to retrieve the value of a mapped field in a given row use <property> where "property" is the name of property / mapped field
pageproperties-jsmodule-import-pagenamef: Templates and parser functions allowed, to retrieve the value of a mapped field in a given row use <property> where "property" is the name of property / mapped field
pageproperties-jsmodule-import-secondste:
Second step
Map imported to local properties
apierror-pageproperties-permissions-erro: permission error: cannot manage or edit page properties
pageproperties-jsmodule-manageproperties: Tip: with allowed values constraint set one of the following as preferred input:
Please add default values or change preferred input
Lists one or more permissible value for a property
Gives the conversion factor for some unit of a physical quantity and the possible names for that unit
Specifies the a comma-separated list of units or formats that a property should use in display
Marks a page in the wiki as having a well-known meaning beyond this wiki, in an external URI
Assigns a datatype to a property
Allows users to reuse elements of external vocabularies directly within the wiki
Adds service links to properties
Lets you indicate that one property is a subproperty of another
Defines a short list of fields with a fixed type and order for datatype Record
Pattern to match a permissible value
Allows to define the display precision in digits
Adds localizable context help to properties
Allows to restrict value annotation to be unique
Adds a reference to a list of permissible values for a property
Declares an external URL with placeholders $1, $2
Specifies an external identifier
Adds localizable labels to a property

pageproperties-jsmodule-pageproperties-d: Are you sure you want to delete this field ?
pageproperties-jsmodule-pageproperties-n:
No properties associated to this page
To add/create properties use the buttons above
pageproperties-jsmodule-pageproperties-o: This version of PageProperties is outdated. Update
pageproperties-form-section-semantic-man: Here you can create, edit, remove and rename properties without to deal with property pages. Renamed properties already annotated will be automatically updated in all the pages which make use of them. To use the [https://schema.org/docs/full.html schema.org] vocabulary in your wiki add in [[MediaWiki:Smw_import_schema|this page]] a subset of the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/MediaWiki:Smw_import_schema following list]. [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Import_vocabulary Check here] to find out more.
pageproperties-form-section-semantic-pro: Here you can set semantic properties without having to manually annotate them on the page. Same properties can be used multiple times. Attention: the values of properties both manually annotated on the page or set through forms, and set here, will be merged together.
pageproperties-js-alert-2: Submitting the form will delete stored semantic properties, continue?
pageproperties-extension-desc: Allows to easily edit display title, language and content model of a page. To associate semantic properties to pages (provided that Semantic MediaWiki is installed), and to set arbitrary SEO meta tags for the entire wiki or specific pages
pageproperties-form-language-help: type a letter to scroll the select there
pageproperties-form-seo_entire_wiki-labe: apply to entire wiki (set values can be overwritten from other pages)
pageproperties-form-publish_as-help: attribution used for links from external pages
pageproperties-form-published-help: If unselected the page is considered a draft and will be not visible to regular visitors
pageproperties-form-seo_subpages-label: Sub-pages (apply to pages inlcuded in this page)
pageproperties-form-seo_subpages-help_: Select to let subpages inherit these values
pageproperties-form-section-seo-label: Here you can set arbitrary metadata for this page and its subpages. If the extension [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:WikiSEO WikiSEO] is installed, you can use the related parameters without the need to annotate them manually on the page.
pageproperties-form-section-main-label-e: Here you can set arbitrary metadata for this page, its subpages and even the entire wiki. If the extension [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:WikiSEO WikiSEO] is installed, you can use the related parameters without the need to annotate them manually on the page.
pageproperties-js-alert-1: Are you sure you want to delete this property?
